translations: v.误传，提供错误消息（misinform 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 误导, 误传, 被误导的, 告诉错误的消息

sentences.sentence: He has been misinformed by members of his own party.
sentences.translation: 他从自己党内成员那里得到的消息是错误的。

sentences.sentence: They were deliberately misinformed about their rights.
sentences.translation: 有人故意向他们错误地说明了他们的权利。
他们只说他们是“搞错了”。
